meanings.definition: Vervets: a type of monkey found in Africa
meanings.sent1: The vervets played in the trees, swinging from branch to branch.
meanings.sent2: A group of vervets chattered loudly as they foraged for food.
meanings.sent3: The vervets decided to have a race to see who could climb the highest.
meanings.sent4: The vervets' agility in the forest was like a ballet of nature.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fur of the vervets made them stand out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: Vervets: the plural form of vervet, referring to multiple monkeys of this species
meanings.sent1: We saw a troop of vervets crossing the road on our safari.
meanings.sent2: The vervets groomed each other, forming strong social bonds.
meanings.sent3: The vervets held a meeting to discuss the best fruit trees to visit.
meanings.sent4: The vervets' teamwork was like a well-oiled machine in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The playful antics of the vervets entertained the onlookers at the zoo.
